caption.p: Model of multivariate analysis and its cross validation. a Principal components analysis (PCA), b partial least square discrimination analysis (PLS-DA), c orthogonal PLS-DA (OPLS-DA), d response permutation testing of the model predicted by OPLS-DA. R2X (cum): cumulative interpretation rate in X direction, R2Y (cum): cumulative interpretation rate in Y direction, Q2 (cum): cumulative forecast rate of model, R2 and Q2: parameters of response sequencing test, used to measure whether the model is over fitted.
